summary: This hilarious genre-bending comedy follows Gary Brewer, along with girlfriend Holly Brewer (no relation), and best friend Trevor Morehouse as Gary quests to reign supreme at the 2006 Rock, Paper, Scissors World Championships.
cast: Tim Doiron|April Mullen|Ryan Tilley|Peter Pasyk|Mairtin O'Carrigan|Karine Dion|Joseph Di Mambro|Chris Baker|Anna-Marie Sutherland|Josh Davis|Domenic Marchese|Lucietta Marchese|Emily Mazi|Katie Mazi|Mary Carmella Mullen|Melanie Mullen|Chrissy Pyle|Edith Pyle
keywords: rock paper scissors|f rated|tutu|tank top|scene during end credits
title: Rock, Paper, Scissors: The Way of the Tosser
